topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eeb37063687215dcb40500#post_54eeb37063687215dcb40500
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eeb2b263687264e7211f00#post_54eeb2b263687264e7211f00
That is almost every online Co-op game where you need to kill an enemy in multiplayer.[/bq]
It doesn't really make sense though, cause you get 300 gold which while is a fair amount it's no reason to run through the ENTIRE FUCKING MAP for.

Imagine if you were playing idunno TF2 and you saw someone running from one edge of the map to the clear other side of the map just to kill steal and ignored any and all enemies in the process.
